definition: Cantonese/short name for Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
Canton-Hankou Railway, linking Guangzhou and Wuchang, incorporated since 1957 into the Jing-Guang Railway 京廣鐵路|京广铁路[Jing1 Guang3 Tie3 lu4]
Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
Baiyue, generic term for southern ethnic groups/also written 百越
Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, established in 2017, consisting of Hong Kong, Macao and nine cities in Guangdong
pinyin: Yue4 Gang3 Ao4 Da4 wan1 Qu1

definition: Cantonese romanization/Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems

sentences.english: The immigrants moved into the mountain area in northeast of Guangdong province and had regional difference.
sentences.chinese: 流民進入粵東北山區具有地區性的差異。

sentences.english: Investigation on the medicinal plants in lowlands of northwestern Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 粵西北部丘陵地區藥用植物調查。

sentences.english: Two pieces of Registration Application Form of Yue O Police Car of Guangdong Province must be provided by Police Car.
sentences.chinese: 警車須提交兩張《粵O粵警車輛登記業務申請表》。

definition: short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]/also pr. [Min2]
Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区 in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂, capital Nanning 南寧|南宁/until 1959, Guangxi province
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]/Gan River in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]

for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
